attributes.action: Suspend Zac Goldsmith from the Conservative Party for Islamophobic campaigning
attributes.background: Zac Goldsmith has led a campaign based on stereotypes, fear and the exploitation of cultural tensions between ethnic minorities. He has continuously suggested that by voting for a Muslim mayor (Sadiq Khan), this is an endorsement of terrorism. This divisive wedge campaign is affronts integration.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This would be a matter for the Conservative Party.
